title: JayzTwoCents
description: This week we're joined by a man that has proven very popular in the gaming scene on YouTube Jay of JayzTwoCents.  Jay reviews all manner of high-end gaming hardware in the PC world but as many of his fans already know he's really big into the automotive scene as well. Jay rolled up in his highly modified Nissan 370z and shares his love of track days and diving into the technical details of fine tuning a car for track and canyon duty. In addition we cover how Jay built his YouTube presence the differences between covering tech and automotive and we learn a little bit about Jay's old projects.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
